sentences.literal: Able consider not change, called able firm.

sentences.chinese: 能慮能固，加好之焉，聖矣。
sentences.literal: Able consider able firm, add like it there, sage.

sentences.chinese: 以財物為用，以貴賤為文，以多少為異，以隆殺為要。
sentences.literal: Use wealth things as use, use noble base as pattern, use many few as different, use flourishing decline as essential.

sentences.chinese: 文貌繁，情欲省，禮之隆也；
sentences.literal: Pattern appearance abundant, feelings desires frugal, rites flourishing;

sentences.chinese: 文貌省，情欲繁，禮之殺也；
sentences.literal: Pattern appearance frugal, feelings desires abundant, rites decline;

sentences.chinese: 文貌情欲相為內外表裏，并行而雜，禮之中流也。
sentences.literal: Pattern appearance feelings desires mutually as inner outer surface lining, proceed together mixed, rites middle flow.

sentences.chinese: 君子上致其隆，下盡其殺，而中處其中。
sentences.literal: Gentleman above reach its flourishing, below exhaust its decline, middle dwell in middle.

sentences.chinese: 步驟馳騁廣騖不外，是以君子之性守宮庭也。
sentences.literal: Steps paces gallop race broad unrestrained not outside, therefore gentleman nature guards palace court.
Human domain this domain, scholar gentleman.
